core:messageResource.core:message: MFC Tender Messages
This tender cannot be used because ({tenderItem.description}) tender is already used.
This tender cannot be used because ({tenderItem.description}) tender is already used. Press continue to override.
This tender cannot be used because there are item discounts in the transaction.
This tender cannot be used because there are item discounts in the transaction. Press continue to override.
This tender cannot be used because there are transaction discounts in the transaction.
This tender cannot be used because there are transaction discounts in the transaction. Press continue to override.
This tender cannot be used because there are promotions in the transaction.
This tender cannot be used because there are promotions in the transaction. Press continue to override.

Card is not a {notEmpty(cardScheme) ? format:formatLocaleString(cardScheme.description) : forceUseCardScheme} card. Please use a {notEmpty(cardScheme) ? format:formatLocaleString(cardScheme.description) : forceUseCardScheme} card or select a different tender.
The card number is not valid.
The card is not a payment card and cannot be used.
Unable to process the card. Please contact your administrator.
The tender is not a card tender type. Please contact your administrator.
Invalid or missing Merchant ID for Acquirer. Please contact your administrator.
Could not load exchange rate for currency {1} from {0}. Please contact your administrator.
Invalid exchange rate for currency {1} from {0}. Please contact your administrator.
An error has occurred processing tender {0}. Please contact your administrator.
Invalid tender amount: {tenderAmount}
Card Declined
